definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: My promise to help you is conditional upon your good behavior.
sentences.chinese: 我答應幫助你，要以你的品行好爲條件。

sentences.english: They are solitary stalkers, ambushing prey from a hiding place.
sentences.chinese: 它們品行孤獨，總是從隱蔽處突襲獵物。
他的優良品行值得稱讚。

sentences.english: The hundred knights were all men of choice behaviour and sobriety of manners .
sentences.chinese: 那一百名武士都是品行端正，絕不胡作非爲的。

sentences.english: To state outright and dare to remonstrate were his conduct of politics .
sentences.chinese: 直言敢諫是他從政品行的主要特點。

sentences.english: It i lo widely ued in coetic nd food product.
sentences.chinese: 它也被廣泛應用在化妝用品和食品行業中。

sentences.english: They urged the food industry to reduce levels of acrylamide in their products.
sentences.chinese: 他們敦促食品行業要減少產品中丙稀酰胺的含量。

sentences.english: The food industry is also responsible for ensuring a safe supply of food to the consumer.
sentences.chinese: 食品行業也應爲確保向消費者提供安全的食品負責。

sentences.english: Tom won a prize for good behavior at school.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆在學校裏得到品行優良獎。

sentences.english: Home in the food industry and the strength of large-scale distribution department.
sentences.chinese: 家在食品行業內頗具規模和實力的經銷部。

sentences.english: Like blood , like good and like age , make the happiest marriage .
sentences.chinese: 門當戶對，品行相近，年齡相仿，是最完美的婚姻。

sentences.english: The Perishables Group is a consulting company in the fresh food industry.
sentences.chinese: 易腐爛食品集團是新鮮食品行業的一家諮詢公司。

sentences.english: Cultivate good conduct and respectful behavior.
The ministry of agriculture, for example, wants to increase self-sufficiency in food.
sentences.chinese: 例如，農業大臣希望在食品行業增加自給自足的程度。

sentences.english: A pardonable sin is regarded as entailing only a partial loss of grace.
sentences.chinese: 可以寬恕的罪孽是指部分美好品行的缺失。

sentences.english: Mary was always holding up her children as paragons of good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗老是標榜自己的孩子是品行端正的典範。

definition: one's character/fret (on fingerboard of lute or guitar)
words and actions/what one says and what one does
to train/to educate/to bring up/to nurture/education/culture/upbringing/early conditioning
